content: row 2 row 5purl row 6cast off remaining 8 9 10 10 sts right side transfer rightmost 20 22 26 30 sts onto 4 5mm needle and rejoin yarn a to neck edge row 1 ws p1 p2tog tbl purl to end row 2 rs cast off 6 7 8 10 sts knit to end row 3p1 p2tog tbl purl to end row 4as row 2 row 5purl 2 row 6cast off remaining 8 9 10 10 sts front using 4mm needles and yarn a cast on 90 100 110 125 sts work 8 row st st change to 4 5mm needles and work a further 7 row st st ending with ws row fold the knitting in half lengthways and pick up and knit each cast on stitch together k2tog with the live stitches on your needles as before work 5 row st st next rowwork 38 43 48 55 sts place marker 1 work row 1 of chart a place marker 2 work to end using the markers as a guide complete chart a over next 20 row once complete remove markers work 6 7 8 8 further row break yarn a and join yarn c work 6 7 8 8 row work 17 22 27 34 sts place marker 1 work row 1 of chart b place marker 2 work to end using the markers as a guide complete chart b over next 32 row once complete remove markers work 6 7 8 8 further row break yarn c join yarn a work 25 30 35 42 sts place marker 1 work 40sts place marker 2 work to end keeping markers in place work 6 7 8 8 row ending with a ws row shape armholes armholes will be worked at the same time as chart c is worked beg with rs row work chart c between the markers and at the same time cast off 4 4 6 8 sts at beg of next 2 row decrease 1 st at each end of next 2 2 2 3 row decrease 1 st at each end of next 2 4 4 5 rs row 74 78 86 93 sts work straight til chart c is complete remove markers work 3 3 6 9 row further row ending with ws row shape neck and shoulders right side row 1 rs knit 33 37 37 41 sts place remainingsts on holder row 2 ws cast off 3 sts work to end row 3knit row 4cast off 2sts work to end row 5-6as row 3-4 row 7knit row 8p1 p2tog purl to end 3 row 9-14as row 7-8 work 5 8 8 8 further row st st ending with ws row 22 26 26 30 sts next row rs cast off 6 7 8 10 sts knit to end next row ws purl repeat previous 2 row once more cast off final 8 9 10 10 sts left side place leftmost 33 37 37 41 sts back onto 4 5mm
